title: Contact
description: If you are interested in attending this event as a participant or have any questions, please reach out to us at <emailLink>contact@hack4change.ca</emailLink>

sponsors.title: Sponsors
sponsors.description: We are grateful for the support of our sponsors who make Hack4Change possible. If you are interested in sponsoring the event, please reach out to us at <emailLink>contact@hack4change.ca</emailLink>
